attacks.name: Synthesis
attacks.text: Take 2 Grass Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon

attacks.name: Poisonous Whip
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned

attacks.name: Critical Bloom
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned and Asleep

abilities.name: Trap Territory
abilities.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is 1 more

attacks.name: Quick-Grow Beam
attacks.text: If Quick-Grow Extract is in your discard pile, this attack does 30 more damage

abilities.name: Ignition
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may take a Fire Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to your Active Pokémon

attacks.name: Inferno Onrush
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself

attacks.name: Crimson Dive
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.text: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon)

abilities.name: Shell Shield
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks

attacks.name: Double Splash
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Water Energy attached, this attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon

attacks.name: Triple Bombardment
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Water Energy attached, this attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon

attacks.name: Surprise Strike
attacks.text: If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does 40 more damage

attacks.name: Aqua Shower
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.text: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon

attacks.name: Mirror Shot
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed

attacks.name: Thunder Bolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.text: Put a random Supporter card from your deck into your hand

attacks.name: Stored Power
attacks.text: Move all Psychic Enegy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon

abilities.name: Infinite Increase
abilities.text: This Pokémon gets +30 HP for each Psychic Energy attached to it

attacks.name: Sweet Scent
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon

attacks.name: Perfume Blast
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon cost 1 Colorless more

attacks.name: Geoburst
attacks.text: This attack's damage is reduced by the amount of damage this Pokémon has on it

attacks.name: Dig
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, uring your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from-and effects of-attacks done to this Pokémon

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage

attacks.name: Rapid Smashers
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage for each heads. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Gunk Shot
attacks.text: Your opponent's ActiveP okémon is now Poisoned

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage

attacks.name: Snatch and Flee
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck. Shuffle this Pokémon into your deck.

attacks.name: Acid Spray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon

attacks.name: Metal Defender
attacks.text: During your opponent's enxt turn, this Pokémon has no Weakness

attacks.name: Adamantine Rolling
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks and has no Weakness

attacks.name: Metallic Turbo
attacks.text: Take 3 Metal Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon

attacks.name: Metal Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon

attacks.name: Cop a Friend
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your Benched Pokémon's attacks, except any Pokémon ex, and use it as this attack. If this Pokémon doesn't have the necessary energy to use that attack, this attack does nothing

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks

attacks.name: Cyberjack
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Trainer card in your opponent's deck

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Put 1 random Starly from your deck onto your bench

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage

attacks.name: Hurricane Wing
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads

attacks.name: Revenge
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 40 more damage

abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may move all Psychic Energy from 1 of your Benched Psychic Pokémon to your Active Pokémon
